title: Humboldt on Colonial Mexican Society Q4

content.question: The passage would be most useful to a historian researching which of the following topics?

choices.label: The global influence of Enlightenment ideals on emerging nationalist movements
The influence of Christianization on ethnic identities
The influence of the Marxist concept of class conflict on Latin American societies
The global influence of economic liberalism on imperial land policies

content.answer: The global influence of Enlightenment ideals on emerging nationalist movements

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
